content:
timeline
  title Phone Swap Request Feature Implementation Timeline
  start October 14, 2025
  section Meeting Notes & Requirements
    - "Define requirements and implementation plan for phone swap request feature" (October 14, 2025)
      attendees: Product Manager, UX Designer, Lead Frontend Developer, Lead Backend Developer

  section Action Items
    - "Create wireframe of modal and form" (UX Team, by EOD October 17, 2025)
    - "Develop new API endpoint and database schema" (Backend Team, target completion October 21, 2025)
    - "Build 'Request Phone Swap' button and basic modal structure" (Frontend Team, begin implementation once wireframes are approved)
    - "Create formal Jira ticket with defined user story and acceptance criteria" (Product Manager)

  section Implementation
    - "Add new button to main phone page" (Frontend Team, October 17-21, 2025)
    - "Implement modal pop-up on main phone list page" (Frontend Team, October 17-21, 2025)
    - "Create dropdown lists for Phone to Request and Phone to Exchange fields" (Frontend Team, October 17-21, 2025)
    - "Implement API endpoint to handle form submissions" (Backend Team, October 14-21, 2025)
    - "Create new table in database to store swap requests" (Backend Team, October 14-21, 2025)

  section Testing & Deployment
    - "Test phone swap request feature" (October 22-25, 2025)
    - "Deploy phone swap request feature to production" (October 26, 2025)
